comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foro_Italico "Foro Italico, formerly Foro Mussolini, is a sports complex in Rome, Italy. It was built between 1928 and 1938 as the Foro Mussolini (literally Mussolini's Forum) under the design of Enrico Del Debbio and, later, Luigi Moretti. Inspired by the Roman forums of the imperial age, its design is lauded as a preeminent example of Italian Fascist architecture instituted by Mussolini." This stadium is also known as the Stadium of the Marbles (Stadio de Marmi). See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stadio_dei_Marmi
